text: Chinyama chachikali chimwachiweni chili chachijumi kundanda, sambano chiwile. Nambo pachiŵandi chakopoche mu Lisimbo lyangali mbesi nambo chajonanjikwe. Ŵandu ŵakutama pa chilambo chasimonje, elo, ŵandu wose ŵanganalembekwa meena gao mu chitabu cha umi chitandile kupagwa chilambo, chasimonje kuchiwona chinyama chichaliji chachijumi kundanda, ni kuwa nambo sambano chikukopochela sooni.
